com.stockticker.logic

Enum StockTicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<StockTicker>
      • com.stockticker.logic.StockTicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockTickerService, Serializable, Comparable<StockTicker>

    public enum StockTicker
extends Enum<StockTicker>
implements StockTickerService
    This class provides the basic functionality of getting stock quotes, tracking, and un-tracking stocks for users.
    Author:
    Michael Grissom

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      Instance of stock ticker service.

      • getStockHistory

        public List<StockHistory> getStockHistory(String symbol,
                                 Date startDate,
                                 Date endDate)
                                   throws BusinessLogicException
        This method returns a list of stock history based on the stock symbol, start date and end date provided. This method provides one method call instead of two in order to get the stock history
        Specified by:
        getStockHistory in interface StockTickerService
        Parameters:
        symbol - stock symbol to get history for
        startDate - stock history start date
        endDate - stock history end date
        Returns:
        a list of StockHistory objects
        Throws:

        Specified by:
        trackStock in interface StockTickerService
